p: The temperature-controlled chambers were programmed to maintain a 12 hr: 12 hr light: dark cycle. Every other day, we moistened the paper towels in frog containers with tap water as needed to maintain a consistent moisture level (paper towels were saturated but there was no standing water) and fed frogs pinhead crickets ad libitum. We changed paper towels at every other feeding and measured CT max on days on which feeding did not occur.
